data.title: H. E. Amrit Bahadur Rai
data.text: His Excellency Amrit Bahadur Rai has been Ambassador and Permanent Representative of Nepal to the United Nations since 04 March 2019. He served as the Vice President of the Seventy-seventh session of the General Assembly and the Chair of The Economic and Financial Committee (Second Committee) at the Seventy-fifth session. Prior to that, Ambassador Rai has worked as a Joint Secretary in various Divisions of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. He also was the Ambassador of Nepal to South Africa (2014-2018) and Minister Counsellor of the Permanent Mission of Nepal to the United Nations, New York (2008-2013). He holds Masterâs Degree in Public Management from the University of Potsdam, Berlin, Masterâs Degree in Public Administration (MPA) and Masterâs Degree in Business Administration (MBA) from Tribhuvan University, Kathmandu.
